text: "Gi' Me Wings" is a 1981 song by Rod Stewart. It is the fifth and final single from his tenth studio album Foolish Behaviour (1980). It was released only as a single in Japan and went to number 45 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart. == Track listing == 7-inch single (Japan) # "Gi' Me Wings" - 3:43 # "Somebody Special" - 4:27 == References == Category:1981 songs Category:Rod Stewart songs
title: Gi' Me Wings
